channel.description: The latest CVEs for djeet -- Finale Lite – Sales Countdown Timer & Discount for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-1120|2024-03-01T09:31:40.619Z -- djeet -- Finale Lite – Sales Countdown Timer & Discount for WooCommerce
item.description: The NextMove Lite – Thank You Page for WooCommerce and Finale Lite – Sales Countdown Timer & Discount for WooCommerce plugins for WordPress are vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the download_tools_settings() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.17.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to export system information that can aid attackers in an attack.
